titleInfo.title: The Foundation of the Theory of Monopolistic Competition Revisited

mods.abstract: It is shown why different price normalization rules influence oligopolistic equilibria in general equilibrium models. This is done for the Roberts and Sonnenschein duopoly and for a price duopoly in an exchange economy. Journal of Economic Literature Classification Numbers: D43, D51.
